title: WTB: Very Low Grade T205s (Cobb, Joss, Mathewson, Grant, etc)
author: mcn

posts.post_title: WTB: Very Low Grade T205s (Cobb, Joss, Mathewson, Grant, etc)
posts.post_content:
Hi - I'm close to finishing a low grade T205 set, and I'm trying to find the following cards in really poor condition (raw PR, As, 1s). If you have any available, I'm interested. Thanks!

Bresnahan (Open)
Cobb
Jimmy Collins
Eddie Collins (Open)  
Grant 
Harmon (One Ear)
Joss
Mathewson 
Wallace (No Cap Either)
Wilhelm (Any)

I have a bunch of lower grade cards, including Grant, on this thread:

[url]http://www.net54baseball.com/showthread.php?t=260937[/url]

Email [url]djdoremus@msn.com[/url] if you're interested.  Thanks.
